name: Bella
shortBio: Bella was adopted together with her two brothers, Bailey and Teddy, in 2020. She was a beautiful diva who loved her Meowmy and CatDad. She had many health issues during her life and passed away from cancer the day after Thanksgiving in 2024.
bio: Bella started her life with her brothers as a beautiful short-hair marbled tabby, but as she got older, she grew the most luxurious floof and mane. A true diva, she loved to be the center of attention and cuddle with her Meowmy. Just before her first birthday, she grew very anemic and came within hours of death. Diagnosed with non-regenerative anemia and cardiomyopathy, she spent the rest of life on daily medications. Bella let this slow her down and would love anyone who visited. Sadly, she developed lymphoma in November 2024 and crossed the Rainbow Bridge the day after Thanksgiving. She is missed dearly by her family and her brothers, Bailey and Teddy. Bella Grace is named in her honor
